article: los angeles dodgers right-hander edwin jackson , who had been recalled from triple-a las vegas earlier in the day to replace odalis perez in the starting rotation , left in the second inning of saturday night 's game against the angels with a mild elbow strain .
abstract: jackson 's start ends early with injury
